discussion_comments.comment_body: For deprecated models, please create a file with the new model name and use `deprecated: true` to mark the old file, or it will make existing model configurations failed to invoke.

@crazywoola 
Thanks.

Have added "deprecated: true" to old models. Please check.
One for example.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/44cea262-76f2-4b67-a4f5-be2710d55838)

discussion_comments.comment_body:
```suggestion
    form: form
```
The value of `key` should not be decided by LLM, which is very dangerous.
